short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn keyboard shortcuts for popular webapps!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of constantly going back and forth between keyboard and mouse, wasting valuable time in the process? With a little help from Shortcut Sensei, scrambling to find the right keyboard shortcut for every action is a thing of the past. When performing an action the long way around, Sensei will instantly notify you of the shortcut you could have used to perform the action faster. This way, anyone can be a keyboard ninja in no time!

Works with Gmail.
